name: 精灵幻境 Elven dreams
description:
In this game, you will enter a world full of magic and fantasy. As an elf manipulator, your goal is to explore mysterious locations, collect and capture more powerful elf companions, and hone your favorite elves in battle!

Each sprite has a unique appearance, skills, and attributes, and you'll need to choose and train your sprite wisely to level up and evolve to take on different combat challenges.

In battle, you'll have to use your elves' skills and strategies to dodge the projectiles and collisions of many hostile elves, challenging different bosses in each setting to find the combo that suits you best

Beautiful graphics and sound effects will take you into a gorgeous and mysterious fantasy that immerses you in a world of elves and magic, where every elf you encounter can be captured. Get ready to start your elf collecting adventure!
